name: Five Nights At Bambis
description: This game is a fan game for FNAF named Five Nights At Bambis. Here you as Dave sitting in his secret room, and now i'm going explain why. Dave was trying to steal a corn from Bambi's farm, but Bambi did see it. After that Bambi becomes angry and calling his friends to help him getting revenge on Dave. That's it. Controls: T - activate tablet, M - wearing a mask and S - to skip cutscene or warning.
